display_long_description:
Forgotten Monks is a terrifying Gorilla Tag-style fangame that drops you into the forgotten remains of an abandoned toy warehouse. Once the heart of a popular monkey-themed toy company, this warehouse now echoes with silence—until the sun goes down.

You play as a lone explorer drawn in by rumors of cursed prototypes and haunted mascots. Using Gorilla Tag’s unique locomotion—climbing, jumping, and swinging—you’ll navigate eerie storage rooms, conveyor belts, and dimly lit testing chambers where twisted versions of once-beloved monkey toys now lurk. These aren’t ordinary monsters; they’re failed experiments—smiling, stitched-together dolls and animatronic horrors that remember being thrown away.

As you explore deeper into the warehouse, you’ll uncover audio logs, broken displays, and mysterious symbols hinting at what really happened here. Work with friends to solve puzzles and escape or enter alone and test your nerves. But be warned: the longer you stay, the more aware they become of your presence.

With creepy ambient sounds, dynamic lighting, and multiplayer support, Forgotten Monks blends nostalgic charm with pure nightmare fuel. Will you escape the warehouse—or join the shelf of forgotten playthings?
